job_description: Description: Lead Sr. Data Scientist w/ The Trade Desk, Inc. in Denver, CO. * Telecommuting permitted:work may be performed w/in normal commuting distance from the Trade Desk.Inc. office in Denver, CO. Build machine learning pipeline that leverage large data sets to generate & dvlp algorithms capable of learning & eventually making predictions. Program in Python & Scala & implement the machine learning models into TTD platform. Position reqs a Master’s deg (U.S or foreign equiv) in Stats, Math, Comp Sci or rel field & 5 yrs of exp in the job offered or rel role OR Ph.D. deg (U.S or foreign equiv) in Stats, Math,Comp Sci or rel field & 3 yrs of exp in the job offered or rel role. Must have 3 yrs of exp w/: end-to-end Machine Learning projects; Python;stat methods for evaluating the performance of data-driven products,incl time series analysis & significance testing; & Data Wrangling & Visualization. Salary: $165,200 - $247,800/yr. Qualified Applicants: Apply online at https://careers.thetradedesk.com/jobs/4255245007/lead-sr-data-scientist.

Qualifications: Position reqs a Master’s deg (U.S or foreign equiv) in Stats, Math, Comp Sci or rel field & 5 yrs of exp in the job offered or rel role OR Ph.D. deg (U.S or foreign equiv) in Stats, Math,Comp Sci or rel field & 3 yrs of exp in the job offered or rel role

Must have 3 yrs of exp w/: end-to-end Machine Learning projects; Python;stat methods for evaluating the performance of data-driven products,incl time series analysis & significance testing; & Data Wrangling & Visualization
Responsibilities: Build machine learning pipeline that leverage large data sets to generate & dvlp algorithms capable of learning & eventually making predictions
Program in Python & Scala & implement the machine learning models into TTD platform
